channel.title: [pi] [317] [Need help with fally party room door!
channel.description:
I am trying to get in the party room so i can do a ::party command and it automatically teleports them there, but i cant seem to get in. :/
If someone could tell me how I could open the door, and make a ::party command that will tell the whole server "There's a drop party hosted by (Name) At ::party "
Please help me.
It's camelot party room btw.

item.title: [pi] [317] [Need help with fally party room door!
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

Why not just teleport them directly into the party zone?

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("party")) {
	c.getPA().startTeleport(X, Y, Height, "modern");
}

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("hostparty") && c.playerRights == 3) {
	for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
		if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
			Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
			c2.sendMessage("There's a drop party hosted by " + c.playerName + " at ::party");
		}
	}
}

First code teleports you to the party zone. You’ll need to add in the teleport int’s.

Second code sends a server messages saying “There’s a drop party hosted by (Name) at ::party”. You need to be rank 3 to use this command, since people would just spam the command. I’m not going to give you the code for a timer…

If there’s any problem with either one, just post here. I coded them in here.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] [317] [Need help with fally party room door!
